alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 3:08AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...LIGHT FREEZING RAIN WILL AFFECT FALLON...CUSTER...NORTHERN CARTER AND NORTHEAST ROSEBUD COUNTIES... Scattered rain showers are developing and will move northwest to southeast through the area until 5 am. Temperatures are in the teens and 20s, thus patches of light freezing rain are expected. Roads and sidewalks may see a light glaze of ice. This includes I-94 near Miles City and Highway 12 from Miles City to Baker. Please travel with caution. The potential for freezing rain will end before sunrise. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Baker, Ekalaka, Plevna, Ismay, Ollie, Locate, Angela, Westmore, Strawberry Hill Recreation Area, Matthews Recreation Area, Willard, Mill Iron, Webster, Twelve Mile Dam, Medicine Rocks State Park, Rock Springs, Mizpah and Knowlton. The freezing rain may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.
